company_to_user_same.label: Transfer to user in the same company
company_to_user_same.description: Transfers money from the company account to a user within the same company.

company_to_user_other.label: Transfer to user in another company
company_to_user_other.description: Transfers money from the company account to a user in another company.

company_to_company_other.label: Transfer to another company
company_to_company_other.description: Transfers money from one company account to another company.

company_to_external.label: Transfer to external recipient
company_to_external.description: Transfers money from the company account to an external recipient.

user_to_user_same.label: Transfer to user in the same company
user_to_user_same.description: Transfers money from a user account to another user within the same company.

user_to_user_other.label: Transfer to user in another company
user_to_user_other.description: Transfers money from a user account to a user in another company.

user_to_company_same.label: Transfer to own company
user_to_company_same.description: Transfers money from a user account to their own company.

user_to_company_other.label: Transfer to another company
user_to_company_other.description: Transfers money from a user account to another company.

user_to_external.label: Transfer to external recipient
user_to_external.description: Transfers money from a user account to an external recipient.

external_to_user.label: External transfer to user
external_to_user.description: Receives money from an external source into a user account.

external_to_company.label: External transfer to company
external_to_company.description: Receives money from an external source into a company account.

validations.select_company_first: Please select the target company first.
